Day 1.title: Feast of Saints Peter and Paul

facts.1: The feast day commemorates the martyrdom of the apostles Saint Peter and Saint Paul.
facts.2: It is a liturgical feast in honor of the lifetime achievements of Saint Peter and Saint Paul.
facts.3: The holiday is widely observed with mass, prayer, and feasts in Catholic and some Protestant nations.

facts.1: This day marks Seychelles' independence from British rule in 1976.
facts.2: Celebrated with vibrant parades, cultural performances, and fireworks.
facts.3: National awards and honors are bestowed on citizens.

facts.1: Professionals are recognized for their contributions to the development of the country.
facts.2: Engineering students and professionals gather for events.
